glsa.title: Game Music Emu: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Game Music Emu, the worst of which could lead to the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Game Music Emu is a multi-purpose console music emulator and player library.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Game Music Emu. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted SPC music file, using Game Music Emu or an application linked against the Game Music Emu library, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
